span.description: Number of grids occupied by columns

offset.description: Number of grids for column offsets

direction.description: The optional value of layout direction is row column
direction.description_zh: 布局方向的可选值为行列

justify.description: Main axis arrangement, can be set to flex-start flex-end center space-around space-between
justify.description_zh: 主轴布置，可设置为柔性起动-柔性端中心间距-周围间距-间距

align.description: Cross axis arrangement, can be set to stretch center flex-start flex-end baseline
align.description_zh: 交叉轴布置，可设置为拉伸中心挠性-启动挠性-端基线

xs.description: <768px Responsive columns or column props object
xs.description_zh: <768px 响应式列或列 props 对象
xs.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }

sm.description: ≥768px Responsive columns or column props object
sm.description_zh: ≥768px 响应式列或列 props 对象
sm.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }

md.description: ≥992px Responsive columns or column props object
md.description_zh: ≥992px 响应式列或列 props 对象
md.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }

lg.description: ≥1200px Responsive columns or column props object
lg.description_zh: ≥1200px 响应式列或列 props 对象
lg.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }

xl.description: ≥1920px Responsive columns or column props object
xl.description_zh: ≥1920px 响应式列或列 props 对象
xl.type: string | number | { span?: number | string, offset?: number | string }
